document.docAuthor: Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre & Rider, David A.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

subSubSection.paragraph:
New data. Isfahan province: 30 km N Natanz,
N 33 ° 48 ’51.1’’
–
E 51 ° 40 ’53.7’’
, 4001 ft asl,
7 .v. 2013
; Javinan, Qamsar to Ghohrood road,
N 33 ° 41 ’ 41.7’’
–
E 51 ° 26 ’ 45.9’’
, 6943 ft asl,
9 .v. 2013
J. Haxaire rec, P. Ducamps det et leg.
General distribution. Western Mediterranean Europe, North Africa (Canary Archipelago), Near East, Central Asia extending to Mongolia , China , Pakistan .

Host plants. On wild Poaceae (
Modarres Awal 1996 a
), wheat (
Modarres Awal 1996 a
,
1997 b
), bean caper, harmel, seidlitzia , saltwort, sugar-beet (
Modarres Awal 1997 b
),
Ephedra major
( Ephedraceae ),
Artemisia
sp. ( Asteraceae ),
Kochia
sp. ( Chenopodiaceae ), barley (
Nateq Golestan & Modarres Awal 2012
),
Chenopodiaceae (Linnavuori 2012 )
, in pistachio garden (
Modarres Awal 1997 b
;
Zeinoddini Memand et al . 2012
); also on
Pistachia vera
( Anacardiaceae ),
Alhagi pseudalhagi
( Fabaceae ),
Peganum harmala
,
Zygophyllum fabago
(both Zygophyllaceae ),
Salsola kali
( Salsolaceae ),
Artemisia annua
( Asteraceae ) (
Zeinoddini Memand et al . 2013
); on
Beta vulgaris
( Amaranthaceae ),
Sueda vera
( Chenopodiaceae ) (Ribes & Pagola Carte 2013 ).

Comments.
Brachynema germarii
is a vector of
Nematospora coryli
to pistachio trees (
Safavi 1974
). An unidentified species,
Brachynema
sp. was recorded by
Hashemi Rad et al . ( 2000
, 2002 ) from Kerman as the pest of pistachio which we suspect to be
B. germarii
.
